layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x84
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x84
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,8) size 784x68
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,0) size 536x68 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection (anonymous) at (1,1) size 534x66
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 534x62
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (2,2) size 264x62 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (21,21) size 222x19
                text run at (21,21) width 222: "This cell should have 20% padding"
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (268,2) size 264x62 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (21,21) size 222x19
                text run at (21,21) width 222: "This cell should have 20% padding"
